title: PRINTED SILK KESA
desc: Long kesa robe in pure silk twill with pure silk twill lining. This model features a waist belt, a placed print with a foliage-inspired pattern and edges embellished with a geometric motif.• Regular fit• V-neck• Fastened with detachable belt• Made in Italy• The model is 5' 9½" (177 cm) tall and wears a size S
